title: Automatic Redstone Jukebox
briefDescription: The standard Minecraft jukebox just isn't good enough, This redstone jukebox lets you select any song and will automatically play it for you. When the ...

crawledImageUrls.text: The standard Minecraft jukebox just isn?t good enough, This redstone jukebox lets you select any song and will automatically play it for you. When the song is finished, The machine will take it out and return it to its original place, ready for the next person.

title: DiamonC?s 5 Slime Block Creations
briefDescription: Ever wanted to fly a private jet to the nearest village? Perhaps you want to tame a dragon and rule the skies! Or maybe control ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Ever wanted to fly a private jet to the nearest village? Perhaps you want to tame a dragon and rule the skies! Or maybe control a giant indestructible mech that destroys everything in its path! You can do all that in DiamonC?s 5 Slimestone Creations! We have everything from a simple motorcycle to a fancy private jet to a fear-inspiring ghast-powered fire-spitting dragon! So what are you waiting for? Download now

Note: All robots excluding Boreus and Boreus prime (uses observers for weaponry, not essential), are observerless, and thus are easier to build.
If you have any problems, questions, or would like to collaborate, please comment below.
Tutorial ? At the beginning of the world, there will be a brief tutorial on how to start / start the main engine, as well as Boreus? engine.
1. Simple Motorcycle ? This simple motorcycle is fast, easy to make, and stylish!
This motorcycle is the smallest of the creations, and requires just 5 honey blocks to make. To start, break the obsidian, and replace it to stop.

2. Private Jet ? This fast airplane is great for flying in style, and seeing the world from a new perspective.
As with the other designs, it?s as simple as breaking the obsidian block!
3. The Mantis Mech ? Although small, this mech is great for causing chaos, as is very hard to destruct. Trying to throw TNT at it? It will just fly right back at you! Destroyed it?s leg? It will keep on going.
This design is more complicated and is the first weaponized design on the list. With 2 minecarts, you can easily switch from the tail (to start), and the cockpit (to fire TNT and to brake.)

4. Boreus ? This albeit, slow dragon is perfect for inspiring fear! With being able to hold 20,000+ items of cargo, or 30+ passengers, this dragon is incredibly useful. It is a bit slow to reduce lag for low-end devices.
This is the only design that uses a observer-powered engine, so it will be slower to reduce lag for low-end devices. To start, simple ?update? any observer, and place obsidian to stop it.

5. Boreus Prime ? This incredibly fast version of Boreus wreaks havoc wherever it flies! Piloted by Ghasts, this ship is well defended and has A double fire TNT canon, as well as a Ghast canon and 2 blaze canons. You don?t want to mess with Boreus Prime!
Boreus prime uses a faster observerless engine like the first 3, so it may be laggy for low-end devices. It is mostly identical to Boreus prime but it has a Ghast canon and different looks.

title: Redstone 3D Printer
briefDescription: A fully working 3D printer in Minecraft bedrock has been a awaited project, but the day has finally come where that has come true and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A fully working 3D printer in Minecraft bedrock has been a awaited project, but the day has finally come where that has come true and a fully functioning 3D printer is in Minecraft right know. Watch the video.
The printer takes about 2 hours 30 minutes to print a 10 x 6 x 9 image. This printer is not hard to use at all.
Takes you too the output spot

Takes you to the Designer Area and the storage
Parts And What They Do

title: Zhaox?s Awesome CommandBlock World!
briefDescription: This command block world shows you all of my creations that I've made, this world was used to be for testing but since it brought ...
Description:
Welcome to my Awesome CommandBlock Creations!
This world as I said, includes awesome and unique commands. But that?s not the only purpose of this map, feel free to check the commands itself, it will maybe ensure your command block skills or maybe improve a little. You can also learn from this world if you want to make a map yourself. Just try not to change the command tho.

Okay, so, this is what you will see if you enter the world. This map includes 10+ command block creations that maybe you could be interested to see.
Like for example, this are creations that you will see in this world. The commamd itself might be buggy, because I made these things a long time ago. Feel free to test it yourself and report any bugs that you might see.

? Custom arrows, or should I say, magic arrows. This arrow have its own special effect that are not in minecraft. This creation have the command such as ?execute? and ?detect?. Please note that this will only work if you hit the grass as it uses a detect command.

? Infinity Gauntlet also known as Infinity Fishing Rod. This unique item acts like exactly a gauntlet in Avengers Endgame and Infinity War. I?m afraid to say that the only ability this can do is SNAP! Yeah, it?s pretty awesome right? But, don?t worry, I will try my best to add many abilities as I can, like how the Time Stone works(I?m currently working on it). So expect an update. The only ability you can do is a snap. This one is one of my favorite creations that I?ve made so far.

? Color changing sign, well this one is rather simple or unique, it depends on you. You can use this as decoration for anything you are doing. But it?s cool right? You can also change it to animating. So feel free to use this.

? Bedwars bed mechanics, this one is my third favorite so far. If you break the bed, there will be a message that will pop that you see exactly in hypixel bedwars. Pretty cool right? This will help you if you are making a bedwars map yourself.

? Up/Down Animating Door, my second favorite, this door will act like it?s really opening. This also has a particle that added a lot of detail in this contraption, it acts like there is gas escaping in the door. This will help you if you making a laboratory doors. Feel free to check the commands.

? Morph, ah, the last one that I included in the description. This creation is so cool, you can morph into a bat or a chicken, perfect for trolling your friends. But do you think that?s everything in the map? The answer is No. I only included few because I?m too lazy to make a description on all of the creations, this will take a long time.

title: 7 Segment Display Driver!
briefDescription: This is a follow up world of my display that i made using binary coded decimal, this has all the drivers and such so have ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a follow up world of my display that i made using binary coded decimal, this has all the drivers and such so have fun! all you have to do is put in your numbers in binary and it should come up correctly on the display!
Here is my youtube video!
So just put in the binary and it should come up with your decimal number
This display drive is much more efficient and compact than making a rom display drive.

title: Short Command Block Death Run
briefDescription: A short death run! Dart through the traps lining the marble halls as the death (chosen randomly) attempts to end your life! A fairly short ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A short death run! Dart through the traps lining the marble halls as the death (chosen randomly) attempts to end your life! A fairly short play that lasts between 5-10 minutes
This is a short death run map that will be expanded on eventually
The death must try to trap the runners by using many different types of traps (one of them involves a crossbow)!
Almost all of the traps are command block based, so cooldowns and transitions are seamless!
There is also some parkour involved, like this version where you must choose a path to cross to the other side

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
briefDescription: This minigame requires 2 people.A Minecraft redstone recreation of a classic, simple game of Tic Tac Toe where water (circle) and lava (cross) fight eachother ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This minigame requires 2 people.
A Minecraft redstone recreation of a classic, simple game of Tic Tac Toe where water (circle) and lava (cross) fight eachother to see who gets the first 3 in a row
Read the signs first,
One player goes to the left door (water) while the other player goes to the right (lava), and fight with their brains and outsmart the other. at the side if the lamp is on it means it?s your turn.
If there?s a flaw or something broke or you have a suggestion? feel free to comment.

title: Redstone Calculator!
briefDescription: This is a small 4 bit redstone calculator, built so you can see how logic gates and parts of the circuit are built. Using this knowledge ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a small 4 bit redstone calculator, built so you can see how logic gates and parts of the circuit are built. Using this knowledge you can go out and build your own calculators with designs like this.
The calculator can do up to 10 + 10
This is a 4 bit redstone calculator demonstrating the usage of logic gates to add binary numbers.
Features are:
8 bit number storage
7 segment display with driver
easy to use input panel
colour coded parts

title: Cerul Milionarului ? The Millionaire Sky
briefDescription: This map is a map with a challenge of the past, the completion of the monument, the purpose is to make money and buy the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a map with a challenge of the past, the completion of the monument, the purpose is to make money and buy the necessary objects for the monument to complete the map.
The map is in Romanian, partly in English (some words)
On the given map it is possible to use your potential to the full by manifesting your creativity.
Banuti = Money

The map contains two shops (2) one for sale and another for buying items (items).
There is also an island with Random Minecraft Generator, an island where an urn is created where any item you throw in it will pay $ 1 (regardless of itm), there is an island of hell (nether) where you can find Glowstone Generator and Generator of Quartz.

title: Modern Estates
briefDescription: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, ...
Description: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P city that has a multitude of attractions such as 50+ heavily detailed houses of all types, apartments, townhouses, city centers with lots of places to theoretically ?go shopping? at, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, cafes and restaurants, schools, and much more. It is important to know that this is NOT A COMPLETE WORLD so there is tons of room for my sister and me to improve and add on to it. We aren?t the most experienced builders so please give us patience while we improve on our building skills. Updates should come a couple of times a month if possible. Our Instagram accounts are L7kee (https://www.instagram.com/l7kee/) and Honeydoq (https://www.instagram.com/honeydoq/). We are constantly trying to improve on this world so please message any concerns to our Instagram accounts mentioned above.

crawledImageUrls.text: Modern Estates is a massive W.I.P. map that my sister and I have been developing for months. So far there are about 50+ houses, a couple of apartments and townhouses, two cities with city centers, several strip malls, a multitude of stores, rollercoasters, name-brand fast-food restaurants, theaters, and much more.
